dmca.title: Coxe's objects to Consumerist's skewer
dmca.body:
To Whom it May Concern:

This letter is written on behalf of Coxe's Enterprises LLC (hereinafter "Coxe's"), regarding copyrighted information belonging to Coxe's that was found on your website, www.consumerist.com.  Coxe's has advised us that a copyrighted photograph of Gary Coxe was found on your website in connection with a January 12, 2006 posting.  Gary Coxe's name, which is subject to trademark protection, was used several times in the posting.  In addition, much of the posted information was confidential and proprietary information belonging to Coxe's.  Neither the "anonymous tipster" nor Gawker Media had permission to use the photograph, Gary Coxe's name or Coxe's confidential information.

Therefore, on behalf of Coxe's, demand is hereby made of you to cease and desist use of this photograph, Gary Coxe's name, as well as any other copyrighted and/or confidential information belonging to Coxe's and immediately remove all the information from your website.

Please be advised that if this action continues, we will advise Coxe's as to the legal avenues available to further protect their legal rights.  These options may include filing an injunction against you, filing a civil lawsuit and/or seeking reimbursement of any attorneys' fees and costs associated with action. 

PLEASE GOVERN YOURSELF ACCORDINGLY.

Sincerely,
[Signature]
[private]

cc: Coxe's Enterprises LLC
Attn: [private]
[private]
Lakeland, FL 33811-1396
dmca.sender_name: DeBeaubien, Knight, Simmons, Mantzaris & Neal, LLP
